titles.title: Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail Amendments Act of 2003
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to extend the Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail.
Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail Amendments Act of 2003

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail Amendments Act of 2003 - Amends the National Trails System Act to extend the Lewis and Clark National Historic Trail to include the route traveled by Meriwether Lewis and William Clark from the Falls of the Ohio, located in Clarksville, Indiana, and Louisville, Kentucky, to Wood River, Illinois.
